title: Reopening Out The Frying Pan, Epstein and Lovebirds Rewatch 6.1.20
itunes:title: Reopening Out The Frying Pan, Epstein and Lovebirds Rewatch 6.1.20
description:
In episode 641, Jack and Miles are joined by Citizen Critic co-host Greg Conley to discuss Janelle Monae and Labyrinth, America re-opening, The Lovebirds, the new Netflix Jeffrey Epstein doc-series, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Who should play the Goblin King in the ‘Labyrinth’ sequel?
  2. L.A. County can reopen restaurants, barbershops, salons, Newsom says
  3. Florida Governor Outlines Next Steps In Theme Parks’ Reopening Path
  4. Universal Studios Orlando Also Has A Blunt Warning For People Choosing To Visit The Parks
  5. Before Netflix’s Epstein Docuseries Filthy Rich There Was A Bombshell Book
  6. 7 Shocking Revelations From Netflix’s New Jeffrey Epstein Documentary
  7. Bill Clinton and James Patterson’s ‘The President Is Missing’ is an awkward duet
  8. James Patterson looked for Clinton, Trump links to sex offender. What did he find?
  9. Bill Clinton and James Patterson Are Writing a Second Book Together
  10. black people riot when their anger over being murdered and oppressed reaches a boiling point. here are some fun reasons why white people have rioted
  11. WATCH: Juls & Sango - Ritmo Coco (Visual)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
